article.title: Toward real-time data query systems in HEP

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the main bottleneck observed in Figure 1, even when using selective reading or slim datasets?
According to Table 1, what is the approximate speedup achieved by simply loading only the necessary jet pr branch in ROOT compared to loading all 95 jet branches?
Table 2 illustrates the concept of "exploding" nested data. What is the primary advantage of storing data in this exploded format for analysis purposes?
choices: Reduces memory usage by eliminating redundant information.
Enables selective reading of only the attributes required for a specific analysis.
Simplifies data visualization by presenting information in a tabular format.
Improves data compression ratios by grouping similar data elements together.

multiple_choice_question.text: In the distributed query processing scheme illustrated in Figure 2, what is the primary function of the "Coordinator" component?
choices: Executes user-defined analysis functions on the distributed data.
Stores and manages the original input data from the experiments.
Manages the distribution of subtasks to compute nodes and tracks their progress.
Aggregates partial results from compute nodes into a final result for the user.
